Once the cursor is created, I should run the agent to find the first occurrence. Using mcp-run_agent with the cursor name and task description to locate the first mention.

If the first result doesn't have the mention, I'll continue iterating by running the agent again until I find the correct paragraph. Once found, I'll note the pointer label and include it in the answer. 

Also, I need to remember that the user wants the first mention, so I shouldn't stop until I confirm that this is the earliest occurrence. If the cursor completes without finding, I should inform the user it's not in the document. 

Let me start by creating the cursor.
